title: 拓展装备材质包使用手册
author: 皓月kanni
txt_content:
本帖最后由 皓月kanni 于 2020-2-1 19:32 编辑 



拓展装备材质包使用手册
本渣的话大家好，这里是皓月
这是我自制材质包 拓展装备材质包ExtendedResource 的使用教程
获取教程

点击前往爱发电，赞助支持作者


材质包原贴




1.安装最新版 拓展装备材质包 / 使用直链给服务器设置材质包
2.找到你想要获得的物品
3.将代码复制入命令方块中
4.红石激活命令方块获得物品



--月界工作室出品
1



拓展装备材质包绿宝石系列
获取教程

点击前往爱发电，赞助支持作者

  绿宝石

特性：生命增加
give @p minecraft:emerald{CustomModelData:1,display:{Name:"{\"text\": \"\\u00a7f绿宝石\"}"}} 1复制代码

  绿宝石剑
+0.5  最大生命值
+1.6  攻击速度
+7  攻击伤害  

give @p minecraft:diamond_sword{CustomModelData:1,display:{Name:"{\"text\": \"\\u00a7f绿宝石剑\"}"},AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:7d,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:Attack,Slot:mainhand},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:0.5d,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health,Slot:mainhand},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:1.6d,AttributeName:generic.attackSpeed,Name:AttackSpeed,Slot:mainhand}]} 1复制代码
  绿宝石镐
+1  最大生命值
+1.2  攻击速度
+5  攻击伤害

give @p minecraft:diamond_pickaxe{CustomModelData:1,display:{Name:"{\"text\": \"\\u00a7f绿宝石镐\"}"},AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:5d,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:Attack,Slot:mainhand},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:1d,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health,Slot:mainhand},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:1.2d,AttributeName:generic.attackSpeed,Name:AttackSpeed,Slot:mainhand}]} 1复制代码
  绿宝石斧
+1  最大生命值
+1  攻击速度
+9  攻击伤害

give @p minecraft:diamond_axe{CustomModelData:1,display:{Name:"{\"text\": \"\\u00a7f绿宝石斧\"}"},AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:9d,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:Attack,Slot:mainhand},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:1d,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health,Slot:mainhand},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:1d,AttributeName:generic.attackSpeed,Name:AttackSpeed,Slot:mainhand}]} 1复制代码
  绿宝石铲
+1  最大生命值
+1  攻击速度
+5.5  攻击伤害

give @p minecraft:diamond_shovel{CustomModelData:1,display:{Name:"{\"text\": \"\\u00a7f绿宝石铲\"}"},AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:5.5d,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:Attack,Slot:mainhand},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:1d,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health,Slot:mainhand},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:1d,AttributeName:generic.attackSpeed,Name:AttackSpeed,Slot:mainhand}]} 1复制代码
  绿宝石锄
+1  最大生命值
+4  攻击速度
+1  攻击伤害

give @p minecraft:diamond_hoe{CustomModelData:1,display:{Name:"{\"text\": \"\\u00a7f绿宝石锄\"}"},AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:1d,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:Attack,Slot:mainhand},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:1d,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health,Slot:mainhand},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:4d,AttributeName:generic.attackSpeed,Name:AttackSpeed,Slot:mainhand}]} 1复制代码
  绿宝石头盔
+1  最大生命值
+2  盔甲韧性
+3  盔甲

give @p minecraft:diamond_helmet{CustomModelData:1,display:{Name:"{\"text\": \"\\u00a7f绿宝石头盔\"}"},AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:1d,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health,Slot:head},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:3d,AttributeName:generic.armor,Name:Armor,Slot:head},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:2d,AttributeName:generic.armorToughness,Name:ArmorToughness,Slot:head}]} 1复制代码
  绿宝石胸甲
+2  最大生命值
+2  盔甲韧性
+8  盔甲

give @p minecraft:diamond_chestplate{CustomModelData:1,display:{Name:"{\"text\": \"\\u00a7f绿宝石胸甲\"}"},AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:2d,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health,Slot:chest},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:8d,AttributeName:generic.armor,Name:Armor,Slot:chest},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:2d,AttributeName:generic.armorToughness,Name:ArmorToughness,Slot:chest}]} 1复制代码
  绿宝石护腿
+1  最大生命值
+2  盔甲韧性
+6  盔甲

give @p minecraft:diamond_leggings{CustomModelData:1,display:{Name:"{\"text\": \"\\u00a7f绿宝石护腿\"}"},AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:1d,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health,Slot:legs},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:6d,AttributeName:generic.armor,Name:Armor,Slot:legs},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:2d,AttributeName:generic.armorToughness,Name:ArmorToughness,Slot:legs}]} 1复制代码
  绿宝石靴子
+0.5  最大生命值
+2  盔甲韧性
+3   盔甲

give @p minecraft:diamond_boots{CustomModelData:1,display:{Name:"{\"text\": \"\\u00a7f绿宝石靴子\"}"},AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:1d,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health,Slot:feet},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:3d,AttributeName:generic.armor,Name:Armor,Slot:feet},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:2d,AttributeName:generic.armorToughness,Name:ArmorToughness,Slot:feet}]} 1复制代码
